DOC.brief_summary: This extension trial SP668 consist two phase : double-blind treatment open-label extension . DOC.brief_title: Two Phase Extension Trial SP668 Investigate Safety Tolerability Sustained Release Fesoterodine Subjects With Overactive Bladder : Double-Blind Phase Followed Open-Label Extension Phase
